short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Yes! Delete Me' handles S3 bucket delete agreement for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copies the bucket name over to the confirm delete input.

Currently only in English and only for the S3 bucket delete console screen.

When deleting an AWS S3 bucket, an input field requires the user to type in the bucket name. This check is important to protect against errors. Skipping it requires you to take on all responsibilities that go with such a life choice...

üêâ

If you feel you can skip this check with confidence this extension will automatically copy over the bucket name into the confirmation field, and, active the delete button for you to action.
